component.name: BetterSpades
component.summary: BetterSpades, an Ace of Spades client targeted at low end systems (GL/ES 1.1). Runs on your grandmother's rig!

description.p: Replicate of the great game Ace of Spades (classic voxlap) runs on very old systems back to OpenGL 1.1 (OpenGL ES support too) shares similar if not even better performance to voxlap can run on "embedded" systems like a Steam Link
Why should I use this instead of ...?

ul.li: free of any Jagex code, they can't shut it down

release.description: Most interesting changes: serverlist now shows country flags first person spectate, press crouch [V] key to activate when dead or in spectator mode, press LMB/RMB to switch between players added logger (also to file) fixed chat input bug remove shotgun reload bug discover LAN servers and show them on server list (HELLOLAN) switch between current and last tool by [Q] key correctly pick block color when block was previously damaged allow voxlap style model rendering press F12 to show network stats like on voxlap aos highlight local player on scoreboard player rendering optimisations show map sector in team color below minimap improved particle performance allow to grab block color from other players invert-y support
